author: publisher12
title: WB State Health & Family Welfare Recruitment 2017 – Hospital, Sanitary Attendant & Other Posts

organizations.name: wb state health & family welfare recruitment
medical laboratory technology/ diploma in laboratory techniques
parganas, district health & family welfare samity
psychology/ social work/ sociology/ anthropology/ human development

text: 1. Technical Supervisor (WBSAP&CS): 01 Post 2. Counselor (WBSAP&CS): 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be between 18-40 years as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation will be applicable to SC, ST & OBC as per Government rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should have passed 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics/ Biological Science before obtaining Diploma or Degree, Diploma in Medical Laboratory Technology/ Diploma in Laboratory Techniques (DLT) from any University/ Institution recognized by the Central or State Government or Degree in Medical Laboratory Technology (BMLT) from any university/ institution recognized by Central or State Government or Post Graduate Degree or Diploma in Medical Laboratory technology (M.Sc in MLT/ PGDMLT) from any university/ institution recognized by the Central or State Government, working knowledge of computers for Post 1 & Master’s/ Post Graduate degree in Psychology/ Social Work/ Sociology/ Anthropology/ Human Development from any institution recognized by Central or State Government, working knowledge of computers for Post 2. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 100/- (non-refundable) for UR, OBC category & Rs. 50/- for reserve category (SC/ ST only) through National Electronic Fund Transfer (NEFT) in favour of “DHFWS BHD (MISC.), Account no. 2104 1040 0001 1778, IFSC code-IBKL0002104, IDBI, Bishnupur Branch”. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.bankura.gov.in from 01-03-2017 from 11.00 AM to 14-03-2017 till 05.00 PM. Important Dates: Starting Date for Online Application: 01-03-2017 from 11.00 AM. Last Date for Online Application: 14-03-2017 till 05.00 PM. For more details like vacancy details, remuneration, place of posting & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt DHFWS Jalpaiguri Jobs 2017 – Nutritionist Posts: Government of West Bengal, Office of the Chief Medical Officer of Health, District Health and Family Welfare (DHFWS), Jalpaiguri has published notification for the recruitment of Nutritionist vacancies for Shaptibari NRC, Jalpaiguri under NHM, Government of West Bengal on contract basis for female candidates. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 08-03-2017 by 04:00 pm. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below…. DHFWS Jalpaiguri Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Nutritionist Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 21 – 40 years as on 01-06-2015. Age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for SC/ ST candidates & 03 years for OBC candidates. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess B.Sc or M.Sc in Foods and Nutrition or equivalent course with Computer Knowledge and able to read, write and speak in Bengali. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on verification of documents and written examination. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their application in prescribed format with attested/ self attested photocopies of residence certificate, mark sheets, date of birth certificate, caste certificate, computer certificate, experience certificate in an envelope should be super scribed with “Application for the Post of Nutritionist” by registered/ speed post to the CMOH & Secretary, DH&FW Samiti, [alpaiguri, CMOH Office, 1st Floor District Health & Administrative building, Hospital Para, Jalpaguri-735 101 on or before 08-03-2017 by 04:00 pm. Important Dates: Starting Date for Receipt of Application: 22-02-2017 Last Date for Receipt of Application: 08-03-2017 by 04:00 pm. For more details like remuneration, experience & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form – DHFWS South 24 Parganas Jobs 2017 – Walk in for GDMO Posts: South 24 Parganas, District Health & family Welfare Samity (DHFWS), Office of the Chief Medical Officer of Health has advertised a notification for the recruitment of General Duty Medical Officer (GDMO) vacancies on contractual basis. Eligible candidates can walk in interview on 15-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, application fee & how to apply are given below… DHFWS South 24 Parganas Vacancy Details: Name of the Post: General Duty Medical Officer (GDMO) Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be upto 64 years as on 01-01-2017. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in Interview. How to Apply : Eligible candidates can attend the interview along with original testimonials, xerox copies of all the relevant documents, age proof, address prrof, MBBS Mark sheets, MCI/ WBMC Regd Certificates, other testimonials on 15-03-2017. Venue details are mentioned below. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 15-03-2017. Reporting Time: 10.00 – 12.00 Noon. Venue: CMOH Office, M,R.B. Hospial Complex, Tallygunge, Kolkata -33. For more details like remuneration, place of posting & other information click on the link given below….
